name: LineFootball
description:
Play Football a different way. 

Draw lines to set the running routes for your players. 

Try to score touchdowns or try to prevent it. 

This game is a hotseat two player game.

Instructions:

The Red Team starts. Red has to draw lines for each player. Goal is to reach the opponents endzone with the ball carrier. After Red drew his lines, its now Blues turn. All players have a restricted area around them. This area shows, how far the player can go each round

There are two buttons ingame. "Play" and "Next Round" Use "Play", when both players drew their lines. Now all all characters are running along their routes.

With the "Next Round" button the players can draw new lines.

The player which first scores 3 points wins the match.
